blocks.name: df-fib
blocks.content: Define the Fibonacci sequence, where that each element is the sum of the two preceding ones, starting from 0 and 1. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: fiblem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fib0 , ~ fib1 and ~ fibp1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiblem(setvar s0) {
  |- wf(cmpt(s0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)))), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), cn0)
} = {
  fmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)))), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), cn0, co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))))
  mpteq12i(s0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))))
  ineq2i(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2)), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))
  imaeq2i(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))
  eqid(co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))))
  nn0addcld(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  ffvelrnd(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), cn0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  syl3anbrc(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cn), wbr(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), clt, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  uznn0sub(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)
  ltsubrpd(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2, wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  nnred(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(nat2, crp))
  2rp()
  elfzo0(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2), cfv(chash, cv(s0)))
  ffvelrnd(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1), cn0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wf(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cword(cn0)))
  simplbi(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(cv(s0), cword(cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))))
  wrdf(cv(s0), cn0)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cn))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cn, cfv(cuz, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, co(nat1, caddc, nat1))))
  1zzd(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cuz, nat2), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, nat2), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))))
  simprd(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wcel(cv(s0), cword(cn0)))
  elin(cv(s0), cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))), wf(chash, universe, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf))), wfn(chash, universe))
  hashf()
  ffn(chash, universe, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf)))
  elpreima(chash, universe, cv(s0), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))
  fveq2i(cuz, nat2, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))
  eqcomi(nat2, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))
  s2len(nat0, nat1)
  fveq2i(cuz, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  1p1e2()
  peano2uzr(nat1, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))
  nnuz()
  fzo0end(cfv(chash, cv(s0)))
  diff.cin.s(s0, cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))
  diff.cword.s(s0, cn0)
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, chash)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.cs2.s(s0, nat0, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fib0
blocks.content: Value of the Fibonacci sequence at index 0. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fib0() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfib, nat0), nat0)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(cfib, nat0), nat0, cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), nat0), cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat0))
  fveq1i(cfib, nat0, co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))))
  df-fib(hs0)
  mptru(wceq(cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), nat0), cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat0)))
  sseqfv1(cs2(nat0, nat1), cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), nat0, cn0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cn0, universe))
  nn0ex()
  s2cld(nat0, nat1, cn0, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, cn0))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  eqid(cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))))
  a1i(wtru, wf(cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), cn0))
  fiblem(hs0)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))
  eleqtrri(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2))
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  lbfzo0(nat2)
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)), nat2)
  s2len(nat0, nat1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat0), nat0), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  s2fv0(nat0, cn0, nat1)
}

blocks.name: fib1
blocks.content: Value of the Fibonacci sequence at index 1. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fib1() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfib, nat1), nat1)
} = {
  3eqtri(cfv(cfib, nat1), nat1, cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), nat1), cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat1))
  fveq1i(cfib, nat1, co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))))
  df-fib(hs0)
  mptru(wceq(cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), nat1), cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat1)))
  sseqfv1(cs2(nat0, nat1), cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), nat1, cn0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cn0, universe))
  nn0ex()
  s2cld(nat0, nat1, cn0, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, cn0))
  eqid(cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))))
  a1i(wtru, wf(cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), cn0))
  fiblem(hs0)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)))))
  eleqtrri(nat1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2))
  mpbir3an(wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), wcel(nat1, cn0), wcel(nat2, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, nat2))
  2nn()
  1lt2()
  elfzo0(nat1, nat2)
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)), nat2)
  s2len(nat0, nat1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cs2(nat0, nat1), nat1), nat1), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  s2fv1(nat1, cn0, nat0)
}

blocks.name: fibp1
blocks.content: Value of the Fibonacci sequence at higher indices. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fibp1(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfib, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfib, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, c0))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cfib, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfib, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, c0)), cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), cres(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cfib, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  fveq1i(cfib, co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))))
  sseqp1(cs2(nat0, nat1), cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), co(c0, caddc, nat1), cn0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))))), wcel(c0, cn))
  syl6eleqr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1))), cfv(cuz, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  fveq2i(cuz, cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)), co(nat1, caddc, nat1))
  eqtr4i(cfv(chash, cs2(nat0, nat1)), co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  s2len(nat0, nat1)
  fvmptd(hs1, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), cres(co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))))), co(nat0, cfzo, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(cfv(cfib, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, c0)), cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat1))), universe, wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cmpt(hs0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)))), cmpt(hs1, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat1))))))
  cbvmptv(hs0, hs1, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1))), co(cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat1))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)), cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat2)), cfv(cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq12d(cv(hs0), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2), cv(hs1), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), cmin, nat2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat2, cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: fib2
blocks.content: Value of the Fibonacci sequence at index 2. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fib2() {
  |- wceq(cfv(cfib, nat2), nat1)
} = {
  eqtr3i(cfv(cfib, nat2), nat1, cfv(cfib, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2i(cfib, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  1p1e2()
  3eqtri(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), nat1, co(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, nat1)), co(nat0, caddc, nat1))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, nat1))), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  fibp1(nat1)
  oveq12i(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), caddc, cfv(cfib, nat1), nat0, nat1)
  eqtri(cfv(cfib, co(nat1, cmin, nat1)), nat0, cfv(cfib, nat0))
  fveq2i(cfib, co(nat1, cmin, nat1), nat0)
  1m1e0()
  fib0()
  fib1()
  0p1e1()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fib2() {
  ⊢ (Fibci ` 2)= 1
} = {
  eqtr3i((Fibci ` 2), nat1, (Fibci `(1[+]1)))
  fveq2i(cfib, (1[+]1), nat2)
  1p1e2()
